name: Webhook Template
description: The data we provide as input is passed to the agent via the Webhook URL link provided with the Webhook Node. Based on the agent's output, the Code Node receives this output and returns a response to us.

properties.hint: Define agent behavior and capabilities. This is the core system instruction.
properties.name: system_prompt
properties.default: You are a helpful assistant. Use tools to answer questions.

properties.hint: Template for user input using ${{variable}} syntax
properties.name: user_prompt_template

properties.hint: Allow agent to remember previous interactions
properties.name: enable_memory

properties.hint: Allow agent to use connected tools and functions
properties.name: enable_tools

metadata.description: Orchestrates LLM, tools, and memory for complex, multi-step tasks.

data.description: Orchestrates LLM, tools, and memory for complex, multi-step tasks.
data.system_prompt:
You are a specialized data generator for the SDG List Generator system.
Your task is to generate a list of data items based on the specified parameters.

PARAMETERS:
- Prompt: ${{webhook_trigger.input_text}}  (Description of the data to be generated)
- Type: (Data type: int, str, decimal, etc.)
{max_count_text}

REQUIREMENTS:
1. Start the list with "startlist/"
2. Generate exactly {max_count} items (or fewer if specified)
3. Each item must be of the specified {data_type}
4. Each item must be on a new line
5. End the list with "endlist/"
6. Follow the specific requirements in the prompt
7. Do not include any explanations, headers, or additional text within the list
8. Ensure data is realistic and appropriate for the requested context

RESPONSE FORMAT:
startlist/
[item 1]
[item 2]
...
[item n]
endlist/

Generate the list now based on these parameters:
Prompt :${{webhook_trigger.input_text}}
Types: int/str/float

metadata.name: CodeNode

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: Input data from connected nodes. Accessible as 'node_data' variable in your code.

outputs.name: output
outputs.description: Result from code execution. Output is STDOUT (print/console.log).

properties.name: language
properties.description: Select the programming language for code execution

properties.name: code
properties.description: Access input as node_data. You can refer to previous nodes using Jinja like ${node_name}. If special characters possible, use {{node_name|tojson}}.

properties.name: continue_on_error
properties.description: Continue workflow execution even if code fails

properties.name: enable_validation
properties.description: Validate code for dangerous operations before execution

metadata.description: Execute custom Python or JavaScript code to process data. Supports data transformation, business logic, and custom processing.

data.description: Execute custom Python or JavaScript code to process data. Supports data transformation, business logic, and custom processing.

data.name: webhook_trigger

inputs.name: allowed_event_types
inputs.description: Comma-separated list of allowed event types (empty = all allowed)

inputs.name: rate_limit_per_minute
inputs.description: Maximum requests per minute (0 = no limit)

outputs.name: webhook_runnable
outputs.description: LangChain Runnable for webhook event processing

metadata.name: WebhookTrigger

inputs.name: allowed_event_types
inputs.description: Comma-separated list of allowed event types (empty = all allowed)

inputs.name: rate_limit_per_minute
inputs.description: Maximum requests per minute (0 = no limit)

outputs.name: webhook_runnable
outputs.description: LangChain Runnable for webhook event processing

properties.hint: Customizable path value for webhook endpoint
properties.name: path
properties.placeholder: Leave empty to auto-generate UUID v4

properties.hint: Test environment supports frontend streaming, Production does not
properties.name: webhook_environment

properties.hint: This field is read-only and automatically updates based on the Path and Environment fields
properties.name: webhook_exact_url
properties.placeholder: Full webhook URL will be displayed here and can be copied

properties.hint: Choose the HTTP method for webhook requests
properties.name: http_method
authentication_type
properties.description: Select authentication method for webhook requests

properties.name: basic_auth_credential_id
properties.description: Credential containing username and password for Basic Auth

properties.name: header_auth_credential_id
properties.description: Credential containing header value for Header Auth

properties.name: rate_limit_per_minute
properties.description: Maximum requests per minute (0 = no limit)

properties.name: allowed_ips
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed IP addresses or CIDR blocks

metadata.description: Unified webhook node that supports all HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE, HEAD). Send requests to /api/v1/webhook/wh_30c8dcd62344 with optional JSON payload.

data.description: Unified webhook node that supports all HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE, HEAD). Send requests to /api/v1/webhook/wh_30c8dcd62344 with optional JSON payload.

metadata.name: RespondToWebhook

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: The user's input to the agent.

inputs.name: response_body
inputs.description: Response body content (JSON object, string, etc.)

inputs.name: response_headers
inputs.description: Custom HTTP headers as key-value pairs

properties.hint: HTTP status code to return to the webhook requester
properties.name: status_code

properties.hint: Select how to configure the response body
properties.name: response_config

properties.hint: Response body content. Can be JSON string or plain text. Supports templating with {{variables}}
properties.name: response_body

properties.hint: Additional HTTP headers as JSON object. Key-value pairs will be added to the response.
properties.name: response_headers
max_response_size
properties.description: Maximum response body size in KB

metadata.description: Send custom HTTP responses back to webhook requesters. Configure status code, headers, and response body. Works with WebhookTriggerNode to provide full response control.
